Method Detail

addProgram

boolean addProgram(org.json.JSONObject programJSON)
Initialize a program from its JSON representation

Parameters:
programJSON - Abstract tree of the program in JSON
Returns:
true when succeeded, false when failed a JSON error has been detected

removeProgram

boolean removeProgram(java.lang.String programId)
Remove an existing program.

Parameters:
programId - the identifier of the program to remove
Returns:
true if the program has been removed, false otherwise

update

boolean update(org.json.JSONObject jsonProgram)
Update the program name or sources

Parameters:
jsonProgram - the updated JSON program
Returns:
true if the program has been updated, false otherwise

callProgram

boolean callProgram(java.lang.String programId)
Launch the interpretation of a program

Parameters:
programId - identifier of the program to launch
Returns:
true if the program has been successfully launched, false otherwise

stopProgram

boolean stopProgram(java.lang.String progamId)
Stop the program interpretation

Parameters:
progamId - identifier of the program
Returns:
true if the program has been stopped, false otherwise

pauseProgram

boolean pauseProgram(java.lang.String programId)
Stop the program execution but keep its last state

Parameters:
programId - identifier of the program
Returns:
true if the program has been paused, false otherwise

getListPrograms

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,org.json.JSONObject> getListPrograms()
Return a hash map containing all the programs known by the interpreter. The keys are the programs' name and the value are the programs under their JSON format

Returns:
HashMap with all the existing programs

isProgramActive

boolean isProgramActive(java.lang.String programId)
Check if a program is active or not

Parameters:
programId - the identifier of the program
Returns:
true if the program is active (STARTED), false otherwise
